channel.title: Variable not saving?
channel.description:
Source: Delta
Well I added a variable like TotalDeaths; so everytime someone dies the TotalDeaths goes up but everytime i logout if goes back to 0.
btw that isn't what i am doing it is just an example.
Do you know a way to fix this?
Thanks:)

item.title: Variable not saving?
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

Sup22211:

I have something like that too i made int SOFSpins; and it was not saving i think you answer is to put the int in playersave.java

What even are you on about.

Clearly you aren’t writing out the save file properly. Go do some research into how IO saves and loads

Read full topic
